document.full_text: an explicit opening scene in 'sex on sunday' promises a trip to the dark side of sexuality. but chisa hutchinson, the writer, can't decide whether she wants to titillate or educate.
document.title: theater review | 'sex on sunday': raging domesticity erupts from a dominatrix encounter
lines_and_colors: an explicit opening scene in 'sex on sunday' promises a trip to the dark side of sexuality. but chisa hutchinson, the writer, can't decide whether she wants to titillate or educate.
